info.title: APD-API
info.description: An API to perform air pressure drop calculation through projects and user account

get.description: Get all duct networks from a project

200.description: Success to get all duct networks

get.description: Get one duct network with his id from a project

200.description: Success to get one duct network

delete.description: Remove a duct network in a project. All duct sections associated will be deleted too.

200.description: Success to remove a duct network

message.example: DuctNetwork with name "duct network n째1" has been deleted, all associated duct sections has been deletes too.

patch.description: Update a duct network in a project

200.description: Success to update a duct network

post.description: Add a duct network in a project

200.description: Success to add a duct network

altitude.title: altitude
altitude.description: duct network's altitude below sea level, all duct sections are dependant of this property - in meter (m)

temperature.title: temperature
temperature.description: duct network's temperature, all duct sections are dependant of this property - in degrees Celsius (째C)

generalMaterial.title: general material
generalMaterial.description: Duct network's material, all duct sections are dependent of this property

ductSections.title: duct sections
ductSections.description: All duct sections associated of this project

totalLinearApd.title: total linear apd
totalLinearApd.description: Result of all linear apd calculation in this duct network - in pascal (Pa)

totalSingularApd.title: total singular apd
totalSingularApd.description: Result of all singular apd calculation in this duct network - in pascal (Pa)

totalAdditionalApd.title: total additional apd
totalAdditionalApd.description: Result of all additional apd calculation in this duct network - in pascal (Pa)

totalApd.title: total apd
totalApd.description: Result of total of all apd calculation in this duct network - in pascal (Pa)

get.description: Get all duct sections from a duct network

200.description: Success to get all duct sections

get.description: Get one duct section with his id from a duct network

200.description: Success to get one duct section

delete.description: Remove a duct section in a duct network

200.description: Success to remove a duct section

message.example: DuctSection with name "section DE" has been deleted.

patch.description: Update a duct section in a duct network

200.description: Success to update a duct section

post.description: Add a duct section in a duct network

200.description: Success to add a duct section

get.description: Get all the projects from an user.
Get one project with his id from an user account.

post.description: Add a project in the user account.

generalAltitude.title: general altitude
generalAltitude.description: Project's altitude below sea level, all duct networks and duct sections are dependant of this property - in meter (m)

generalTemperature.title: general temperature
generalTemperature.description: Project's temperature, all duct networks and duct sections are dependant of this property - in degrees Celsius (째C)

ductNetworks.title: duct networks
ductNetworks.description: All duct networks associated of this project

delete.description: Remove a project in the user account. All duct networks and duct section associated will be deleted too.

message.example: Project with name "Project 1" has been deleted, all associated duct networks and duct sections has been deletes too.

patch.description: Update a project in the user account

delete.description: Perform a full removing of user's data and all entity related (projects, duct networks and duct sections).

message.example: User "email@email.test" and all projects are deleted.

post.description: Register request for a visitor who wants a account to use the application.
Confirm register from a user with the email sent on registration.

The user can perform a "Lost password" request. The sytem send an email to the recipient supplied in the request with a guid identifier of a recover entity save in database. The user's account is disabled.

message.example: An email was sent to "email@email.test" with a recovery link.

patch.description: Recover password after a "Lost password" request. The guid is provided in the mail received by user.
The user can update his password in a separated request. I must provide his old password.
